original_text: In times past, when Saul was king over us, it was you who led out and brought in Israel. And the Lord said to you, ‘You shall be shepherd of my people Israel, and you shall be prince over Israel.’”
korean_text: 전에 곧 사울이 우리의 왕이 되었을 때에도 이스라엘을 거느려 출입하게 하신 분은 왕이시었고 여호와께서도 왕에게 말씀하시기를 네가 내 백성 이스라엘의 목자가 되며 네가 이스라엘의 주권자가 되리라 하셨나이다 하니라

sentences.original_text: when Saul was king over us,
it was you who led out and brought in Israel.
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘을 이끌어 내고 들이신 것은 바로 당신이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: And the Lord said to you,
‘You shall be shepherd of my people Israel,
and you shall be prince over Israel.’”
